data.title: Data Science Intern
data.subtitle: Telkomsel
data.desc: Trained BERTopic topic modelling model as natural language processing (NLP) technique. Performed data processing upon 30.000 open-ended-answers data to provide model input utilizing Python. Defined data pipeline and integrated trained model with MLFlow for better model management.

data.title: Teaching Assistant

data.desc: Courses: Human Computer Interaction, Computer Network, Language Theory and Automata. Compiled and assisted with grading assignments and exam. Monitored and provided feedback of students progress.
